General.Name: Her Chee Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Her Chee Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells professional vehicles under the ADLY moto brand name in Taiwan. It offers ATV utility and sports vehicles, agro-delivery ATVs, mini cars, scooters, agriculture ATVs, e-bikes, etc., as well as engines and related parts. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.
